title: PAX East, here I come!
body:
Friend's workplace gets a limited number of discount PAX East tickets, so I snagged one while the getting was good xD

Wasn't even aware PAX East was in Boston, but hey, now I have something to look forward to!

Anyone else who's planning on going?

replies.body: See you there! Cant wait to check out the Riot booth.

> See you there!

WHOO
First red reply, I feel awesome :D

I've got a friend I'll be going with, who's pretty experienced with PAX stuff, and we're League buddies, so I'll most definitely be checking out the League booth(s)!

Hoping to get some League merchandise and goodies, maybe even snag something Twitch-related. Dunno if he's popular enough to have his own stuff, but hey, I can dream xD
